item.title: AlphaSpace: Enabling Robotic Actions through Semantic Tokenization and Symbolic Reasoning
item.description: AlphaSpace enables robotic actions via semantic tokenization and symbolic reasoning, enhancing spatial intelligence in LLMs.

item.title: AlphaMaze: Enhancing Large Language Models' Spatial Intelligence via GRPO
item.description: AlphaMaze enhances LLMs’ spatial intelligence via GRPO, achieving 93% accuracy in maze navigation and showing emergent reasoning.
